artist: Artist: Pierre Bonnard; Publisher: Ambroise Vollard, Éditeur
provenance: Putnam Dana McMillan, Minneapolis and Santa Barbara, Calif.; Estate of Putnam Dana McMillan, bequethed to MIA, 1961.
text: This light and airy scene recreates the Sundy afternoon outings that took place on and by the Seine at Chatou, just outside of Paris. This color lithograph reproduces Bonnard's painting of the same theme done in 1896.
title: Le Canotage
